{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Sky Plate |image = [[File:Sky_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Sky Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Flying}} }} ==Description== The '''Sky Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Sky Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Flying Gems]] {{Gem|Flying}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Sky Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Tin Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Whirl Islands|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Meteor Falls|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sky Pillar|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Solaceon Ruins|Epic}} {{LootItem|Team Galactic HQ|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Flower Paradise|Epic}} {{LootItem|Connecting Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sea Spirit's Den|Epic}} {{LootItem|Team Flare Secret HQ|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
